title: (x) "Raydoor" logo simple sans caps - similar to News Gothic/Trade Gothic {Tom Harpole}
content:
I am looking for an ID on the font used for this logo—If there is one. I know it's not a lot of letters to go on, but the R is pretty distinct.... I was initially heading towards News/Trade Gothics but the O's on those are upright and not as round.

If it helps, their secondary fonts are Frutiger and DIN

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Raydoor.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611191518/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_53.png) | 4.48 KB |
author: colinmford

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611191518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5098.png)

You might be able to get away with News Gothic Bold (shown)

or Franklin Gothic Demi

Each letter is squished or stretched as necessary.
